DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate comfort BEPREVE compare LASTACAFT instillation .
DOC.brief_title: A Patient Reported Ocular Comfort Assessment Comparing Bepreve Lastacaft
DOC.detailed_description: After one drop instill subject complete comfort assessment 1 , 3 , 5 , 10 minute drop instillation .
DOC.criteria: Each patient must meet follow criterion enrol study : 1 . Are male female least 18 year age diagnose allergic conjunctivitis . 2 . Have allergic ocular symptom within last three day . 3 . Are willing/able follow instruction study investigator his/her staff . 4 . Have sign informed consent approve Institutional Review Board Independent Ethics Committee . Patients meet follow criterion exclude study : 1 . Have know hypersensitivity either BEPREVE™ LASTACAFT® component test article ( include `` procedural '' medication anesthetic and/or fluorescein drop , dilate drop , etc. ) . 2 . Have active corneal pathology note study eye screen visit . Active corneal pathology define corneal pathology non stable , great mild , compromise assessment safety efficacy treatment . 3 . Are pregnant nursing/lactating .
